appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

appDescription.message: Proofread your texts as you type based on textlint rules!

choosePreset.message: Choose what type of text you write.

noMarks.message: Your text has passed all tests.

requireRefresh.message: Please refresh the page to use this extension.

aboutP1_1.message: This extension provides you with textlint on Chrome. textlint is a tool that can check your texts with various rules in plug-in way.

aboutP1_2.message: While the original textlint can apply extra rules as plug-ins, this extension only supports bundled rules for usability and localization.

aboutP1_3.message: If you want some rule to be supported by this extension, please contact me for a feature request. However, note that some rules may not work on Chrome properly.

aboutP2_1.message: Feel free to send me (IRIDE Monad) any requests, reviews, or bug report for this extension.

aboutP2_2.message: I am NOT the author of textlint, azu-san. So never send any message about this extension to azu-san. If you are not sure which you should send message to, textlint or this extension, just send it to following account or address.

aboutP3_1.message: This extension and its source code are licensed under The MIT License.

aboutP4_1.message: This extension bundles the textlint core and some rules. Their versions and licenses are following.

ruleAlexDescription.message: Find gender, religious, race or other unequal phrasing; using Alex.

ruleGeneralNovelStyleJaDescription.message: Follow the general novel style in Japanese.

ruleMaxTenDescription.message: Limit the number of punctuations in one sentence.

ruleNoDoubledJoshiDescription.message: Detect repeated particles in one sentence.

ruleNoMixDearuDesumasuDescription.message: Detect confusion of decided tone and honorific tone.

ruleNoStartDuplicatedConjunctionDescript.message: Detect repeated conjunctions at the beginning of sentences.

ruleRousseauDescription.message: Keep readability and simiplicity for better English with Rousseau.

ruleSentenceLengthDescription.message: Limit the length of one sentence.

ruleSpellcheckTechWordDescription.message: Spell-checker for tech words related to JavaScript.

ruleIncrementalHeadersDescription.message: Check the level of headings (h1-h6) is correctly nested.

ruleMaxAppearenceCountOfWordsDescription.message: Limit the number of appearance of words in a paragraph.

ruleNoDoubledConjunctiveParticleGaDescri.message: Detect repeated conjunctive particle "が" (ga) in one sentence.

rulePresetJtfStyleDescription.message: Follow JTF Style Guide for Japanese translators.

ruleSjsjDescription.message: Spell-checker using SJSJ the community-driven dictionary of buzzwords around JavaScript.

labelMaximumEditDistanceFromCorrectSpell.message: Maximum edit distance from correct spelling

labelCharactersAllowedToLeadAParagraph.message: Characters allowed to lead a paragraph

labelDisallowToPutPunctuationsBeforeClos.message: Disallow to put punctuations before closing quote

labelRequireASpaceAfterExclamationAndQue.message: Require a space after exclamation and question marks

labelMaximumNumberOfAllowedInASentence.message: Maximum number of "、" allowed in a sentence

labelShowMarkersOfHintMessagesInTextArea.message: Show markers of hint messages in text area

labelTypeOfMessagesToShowTheSumAsBadge.message: Type of messages to show the sum as badge
